requestBody.description: Represents the input for a request action.

AliasId.description: Unique identifier for an alias associated with the fleet to retrieve all game sessions for.

FleetId.description: Unique identifier for a fleet to retrieve all game sessions for.

GameSessionId.description: Unique identifier for the game session to retrieve. You can use either a GameSessionId or GameSessionArn value.

Limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Use this parameter with NextToken to get results as a set of sequential pages.

NextToken.description: Token that indicates the start of the next sequential page of results. Use the token that is returned with a previous call to this action. To start at the beginning of the result set, do not specify a value.

StatusFilter.description: Game session status to filter results on. Possible game session statuses include ACTIVE, TERMINATED, ACTIVATING, and TERMINATING (the last two are transitory).
